amendment.description: To require reports to Congress on Department of Homeland Security use of data-mining.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4569 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4569 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7387; text: CR S7387) To require reports to Congress on Department of Homeland Security use of data-mining.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4569 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4569 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Feingold.
